text: 🎥 Watch @CVR_Genomics & @CVRbioinfo discussing our research and @CovidGenomicsUK collaboration. The #COGUK consortium has sequenced >320,000 #SARSCoV2 genomes - over half the global genomes! Crucially, this helps us stay up to date with #COVID19 and #vaccine development. https://t.co/1x7jhZdXOZ
